europe.title: European Central Bank Maintains Interest Rates
europe.description: The ECB kept its main refinancing rate unchanged at 4.5%, citing ongoing inflation concerns and economic stability measures.

europe.title: EU Economic Growth Shows Resilience
europe.description: Latest GDP figures indicate steady economic growth across European Union member states, with positive indicators for Q4 2025.

europe.title: Euro Zone Inflation Remains Above Target
europe.description: Consumer prices in the euro area continue to exceed the ECB's 2% inflation target, prompting continued monetary policy vigilance.

romania.title: BNR Maintains Monetary Policy Stance
romania.description: The National Bank of Romania kept its key interest rate steady at 7.0%, focusing on inflation control and economic stability.

romania.title: Romanian Economy Shows Strong Performance
romania.description: Economic indicators suggest continued growth in the Romanian economy, with positive trends in manufacturing and services sectors.

romania.title: Romanian Leu Exchange Rate Stability
romania.description: The RON exchange rate remains stable against major currencies, reflecting confidence in Romania's economic fundamentals.
